He's in Chivtrons base with Windlord, Aerotaur and co. He arrived 
there and met Nightlight and the others. 

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Epyon::
> 
> He looked over the holo projection.
> "Hmmm. Looks good, and I think that other ship would be better 
command
> center, yesss."
> He opens a comm link to Wizard.
> "Wizard, I need you to start the evacuation of the StarJumper, and 
start
> to take it apart. We are almost ready to go with the City plan. So 
start
> taring it down and getting the parts to the CF."
> 
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> He slipped away from Prowl and Epyon. He also opened a comm.
> "Feline, its Hot Rod again. I think we really need to talk, and 
patch
> things up."
> 
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> "Well RamJet, I dont have a problem with this. The Pack will except 
this
> alliance."
> He turned to DarkFate.
> "How about your group?"
> 
> ::Demolition::
> 
> He rather enjoyed the show down between Megaton and Depth Charge.
> 
> ::Dollon::
> 
> He got up and put a hand on DarkMouse's shoulder.
> "I'm going to get something to eat. You want to come?"
> 
> OOC: Ok, where and what is Angel Prime doing? I wasn't really paying
> attention to him. But now that he is mine for a month, I kinda need 
to
> know.
